name: leighzermorphite
title: Leighzer's Morphite
author: Leighzer
contact: Please message me on the factorio forums my username is leighzer.
description: Configurable vanilla friendly mod that adds a new supplemental ore to the game. Without research this new ore can be processed into the other basic ores (iron, copper, stone, and coal). NEW: With research this new ore can be procesed into crude oil and uranium.
